products.name: Plush Dog Bed
products.long_description: A luxurious plush dog bed made from high-quality materials to provide ultimate comfort for your pet. Available in multiple sizes and colors to match your home decor.

products.name: Cat Scratching Post
products.long_description: This sturdy cat scratching post is made from natural sisal and is perfect for keeping your cat's claws healthy and your furniture safe. Comes with a dangling toy to encourage play.

products.name: Interactive Dog Toy
products.overview: Fun and engaging toy for dogs.
products.long_description: This interactive toy is designed to keep your dog entertained for hours. Made from durable rubber, it's great for chewing, fetching, and playing tug-of-war.

products.name: Woven Mouse Cat Toy
products.overview: Fun, durable, and eco-friendly cat toy.
products.long_description: This woven mouse toy engages your cat’s natural hunting instincts with its soft, textured design. Perfect for solo or interactive play, it keeps your cat entertained and active.

products.name: Pet Grooming Kit
products.long_description: This all-in-one pet grooming kit includes a brush, comb, nail clippers, and grooming gloves. Designed to keep your pet's coat healthy and shiny.

products.name: Automatic Pet Feeder
products.long_description: An automatic pet feeder with a built-in timer to schedule meals. Suitable for both dogs and cats, it holds up to 2 liters of food and dispenses portions at preset times.

products.name: Dog Chew Toy Bone
products.long_description: This bone-shaped chew toy is made from natural rubber, perfect for teething puppies and aggressive chewers. Helps clean teeth and massage gums.

products.name: Cat Tunnel Toy
products.long_description: This collapsible tunnel toy provides hours of fun for cats. Made from durable fabric, it's easy to set up and store away. Includes a dangling ball for added entertainment.
